dmca.title: The ArticleInsider Onslaught Continues
dmca.body:
Content Infringement Notice
Attn: User Support, DMCA complaints
On behalf of
Articlelnsider.com



Incident #1

The copyrighted work at issue is the article "Home Security Safes--Exactly Where You Want Them" by Val Hennessey posted on the Article Insider web site at 
http://fireproofsafes.articleinsider.com/32072_home_security_safes.html

Search Query: "Running out to get valuables when you need them can be a problem." 

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.homesecuritystore.com/security_wall_safe.html 
(text located at the bottom of the page)

My email: [private]@infosearchmedia.com

Email of infringing website: [private]@homesecuritystore.com

"I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

Signature: [private]

Fax to [private]
